name: 6uttons
description:
Looking for a quick 5-minute game filled with puzzles and a questionable AI? 6uttons is a fast-paced but fun experience that will make you rattle your brain all while dealing with an ego-filled Artificial Intelligence companion.

Word of advice: the AI has some anger issues so make sure you don't rub him the wrong way, alright?

Eh, you'll be fine... you'll survive... hopefully...

Game Programming: @nikllamadev

Art Direction: @kushion
